46519.「ふん……。どうやら 今回は\n ちゃんと ポーリアが作ったモノのようだな。:
Hmmm... looks like Paulia got it right this
time.

46520.「はがねのオノ。このチョイスは悪くないが\n 錬金効果の界面定着率に かたよりが:
Steel Axe. This choice is not a bad one, but the Link fixation rate of the alchemical effect seems to be a little bit slow. The
development alchemy is high, but far from perfect...

46521.「自分で来ずに 君に 届けさせたのは\n 仕事を 優先した結果ということだろう。:
The fact that he didn't come himself but had you deliver it to me is probably a result of prioritizing work. If that's the case, he's
making some progress.

46522.「だが この出来では 受け取ることはできない。\n 悪いが 持ってかえってくれる:
But I can't accept it with this performance.
I'm sorry, but can you take it back?

46524.「うふふ。来ちゃった。\n トルバン君に どうしても 会いたくって！:
Uh-huh. I'm here. I really wanted to meet Mr.
Torban!

46525.「言ってるそばから これだ……。\n 錬金ギルドは どうしたんだ ポーリア？\n:
I'm telling you, and then this... what's going
on with the Alchemy Guild, Paulia? You can't
just come in here and leave me...

46526.「仕事なら がんばって 終わらせたよ！\n 自分へのごほうびとして 今日は\n:
If it's work, I did my best to finish it! As a
reward, I decided to see Mr. Torban today!

46527.「プレゼントを渡すのは <pc>に\n 頼んだけど やっぱり 自分の目で\n ト:
I asked <pc> to deliver the gift, but
I wanted to see Torban's happy face with my
own eyes.

46528.「これを 受け取るつもりはない。: I'm not going to take this.

46529.「え～！？ それには\n 私の ものすごい愛情が込められてるんだよ。\n なのに:
What? That's filled with my tremendous love.
But why?

46530.「お前は いつまで オレのためだけに\n ツボ錬金を続けるつもりなんだ。\n そ:
How long are you going to continue Pot Alchemy
just for me? I told you, I can't go on like
that.

46531.「……オレたちは もう会わないほうがいい。\n すぐに ツボ錬金ギルドへ帰れ。:
We should not see each other again. Go back to
Pot Alchemy Guild immediately.

46532.「何よ トルバン君のバカッ！\n 私 こんなに がんばってるのにっ！！: Torban, you idiot! I'm trying so hard!

46533.「いいわ……。次を見てなさい！！\n 必ず トルバン君を 納得させてあげるから！:
All right... watch out for the next one! I'll
convince you, Torban. I promise!

46534.「……まったく 困ったものだ。\n オレをよろこばせることが あいつの\n ツボ:
It's a real problem. Making me happy is the
reason for him to continue Pot Alchemy...

46535.「君は <pc>君……だったか。\n おおかた 職人レベルのカベを超えるための\:
You are <pc>...or were you? You came
here because you were told that this was a
Test to get beyond the Craftsman level, right?

46536.「ギルドへ帰り ポーリアの所へ 行くがいい。\n マスターがアレでは 君も大変だ:
Go back to the guild and visit Paulia. I know it must be hard for you with the Master in charge, but please take care of the Pot
Alchemy Guild.
